Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pdb.controller.MainController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class MainController
extends Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    FXML Controller class Main Controller which controll main window of appliacation
    Author:
    gulan and others

      • handleInputEventForShape

        public void handleInputEventForShape(javafx.scene.input.InputEvent t,
                                     javafx.scene.shape.Shape shape)
                              throws SQLException,
                                     IOException
        Handling input events (which come from MapPaneController and which are redirected here) for shape, especially mouseclick event This input events are next redirected to active Contoller (variable this.currentTitledPane)
        Parameters:
        t - input event
        shape - shape on which event begin
        Throws:
        SQLException
        IOException

      • setCurrentTitledPane

        public void setCurrentTitledPane(String state)
        Method to change active controller to which redirect input events on map and on shapes
        Parameters:
        state - Contoller to which redirect inout events possible values: "DEFAULT", "Add entity", "Entity modification", "Multimedia", "Time", "Spatial", "Freeholders"
